definition: ready to start on sth/about to act

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to approach one's coffin (idiom); with one foot in the grave

sentences.english: The birth of qu tunes heralded the birth of a new type of musical system.
sentences.chinese: 曲牌的诞生，宣布了一个新的音乐体系行将诞生。

sentences.english: Thousands of people streamed past the now moribund check points.
sentences.chinese: 数千德国人涌到行将就木的检查站。

sentences.english: This means that the rows will be locked as shared.
sentences.chinese: 这就表示这些行将被锁定为共享。

sentences.english: Mr Sengoku was also scathing about Japan’s habit of using public money to rescue bankrupt firms.
sentences.chinese: 由人先生还批评日本用公款救助行将倒闭公司的怪癖。

sentences.english: I am able to take dictation in English and translate it rapidly into Chellonese.
sentences.chinese: 我会英文的口授笔记，同时能立行将其翻译成中文。

sentences.english: He had taken over an old company verging on liquidation.
sentences.chinese: 他接办了一家行将破产的老公司。

sentences.english: The appearances in Moscow and Accra will be bookends around another round of important multilateral summitry .
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科和阿克拉之行将要列入一系列多国峰会之列。

sentences.english: EX : Jolin will show up rrn the CD shop tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 表示未来行将发作的事情或作为。

sentences.english: From what can you know a store is going to be closed.
sentences.chinese: 你从何而知一个商店行将关闭。

sentences.english: The government of Ernesto Zedillo knew that the food subsidy programs would do little to help.
sentences.chinese: 萨迪略政府知道之前的食物补贴制度已经行将就木。

sentences.english: He rubbed his hands with glee at the prospect of their defeat.
sentences.chinese: 他眼看著他们行将失败，快乐得直搓手。

sentences.english: Mr. Tpowerfulg is nearly sixty years old. He is powerful outgoing principle.
sentences.chinese: 唐先生近六十岁，他是位行将离任的校长。

sentences.english: Is the old faithful axe on its last leg?
sentences.chinese: 你那柄忠实的旧斧头已经行将就木了么？

sentences.english: I am able to take dictation in English and translate it rapidly into Dhellonese.
sentences.chinese: 我会英文的口传条记，同时能当行将其传译成中文。

sentences.english: The ride their will be relaxed and social meandering through a mix of shaded streets and quiet hutongs.
sentences.chinese: 骑行将会很轻松，穿过林荫大道和安静的胡同。

sentences.english: Set up a security cordon around which will be destroyed by the gov.
sentences.chinese: 把行将被政府强拆的房子用警用安宁警示带扯一圈。

definition: on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to be about to arrive/to be around the corner
